# How to install

```sh
$ npm install native-console
```

# How to use

```javascript
//To import module
var c = require("native-console");

//To write
c.write("Hello World!");

//To read from keyboard
var input = c.read();
```

# Example

```javascript
var c = require("native-console");
c.write("Write something: ");
var text = c.read();
c.write("You wrote: "+text);
```
